programme.title: Hey Tracey!
programme.desc:
Joel Dommett hosts as Russell Kane, Jorgie Porter, Paige Turley, Suzi Ruffell, Radzi Chinyanganya and David Potts try to win some normal people £2,500 and a pet-food dispenser. . . .
• Produced in: 2017. • Director: Ollie Bartlett • Producer: Ollie Bartlett Mickey Bishop Sam Pollard
